document.full_text: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori has a narrow lead over left-wing nationalist ollanta humala ahead of peru's june 5 presidential run-off election, a poll by survey firm datum showed on thursday.
document.title: fujimori leads humala in peru presidential poll
lines_and_colors: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori has a narrow lead over left-wing nationalist ollanta humala ahead of peru's june 5 presidential run-off election, a poll by survey firm datum showed on thursday.
